description: Assesses the implications of new digital solutions. Defines the requirements and quantifies the business benefits. Manages the deployment of change taking into account structural and cultural issues. Maintains business and process continuity throughout change, monitoring the impact, taking any required remedial action and refining approach.
title: Business Change Management

levels.3: Evaluates change requirements and exploits specialist skills to identify possible methods and standards that can be deployed
levels.4: Provides leadership to plan, manage and implement significant Information and Communications Technologies (ICT) led business change.
levels.5: Applies pervasive influence to embed organisational change.

knowledges.K2: the impact of business changes on the organisation and human resources
knowledges.K3: the impact of business changes on legal issues

skills.S3: construct and document a plan for implementation of process enhancements
skills.S4: apply project management standards and tools
skills.S1: analyse costs and benefits of business changes
skills.S2: select appropriate Information and Communications Technologies (ICT) solutions based upon benefit, risks and overall impact
